content.thinking:
This is a cron job that's asking me to check PRs in bills-bot for unresolved review threads. Let me break down what I need to do:

1. Check bills-bot PRs for unresolved review threads
2. Only check PRs authored by BillChirico
3. If any PR has unresolved threads, spawn ONE sub-agent per PR to fix them using the spawn template from MEMORY.md
4. If no unresolved threads, respond with HEARTBEAT_OK

First, I should check the current state of PRs in the bills-bot repository. I'll use the `gh` CLI to list open PRs and check for unresolved review threads.

Let me start by listing open PRs in bills-bot.

content.text: I'll check the bills-bot repository for open PRs with unresolved review threads.

arguments.command: cd /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace-build/bills-bot && gh pr list --author BillChirico --state open --json number,title,url --jq '.[] | "\(.number) \(.title) \(.url)"'

content.thinking: No output means there are no open PRs by BillChirico in bills-bot. Let me double-check by listing all open PRs without the author filter to see if there are any PRs at all.

arguments.command: cd /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace-build/bills-bot && gh pr list --state open --json number,title,author --jq '.[] | "\(.number) \(.title) by \(.author.login)"'

content.thinking: No open PRs at all in bills-bot. This means there are no unresolved review threads to address. According to the cron job instructions, if there are no unresolved threads, I should respond with HEARTBEAT_OK.

content.text:
**HEARTBEAT_OK**

No open PRs found in bills-bot repository authored by BillChirico. No action needed.

[cron:041c005d-992e-440c-8521-c014a53ef7fb PR Review Patrol (High Frequency)] Check bills-bot for Bill's open PRs only (author: BillChirico). For each PR, fetch ALL unresolved review threads AND top-level review summary comments. If found, spawn sub-agents to fix them — ONE sub-agent per PR if work is small, MULTIPLE sub-agents if there are many threads/comments (batch by logical grouping). Each sub-agent uses git worktree + Codex CLI. Resolve all threads when fixed. Report summary to Bill via DM. If no unresolved issues, respond HEARTBEAT_OK.
